Home Libraries People FAQ More
value::is_string

Return true if this is a string.

Synopsis 
bool
is_string() const;
Description

This function is used to determine if the underlying representation is a certain kind.

Effects 
return this->kind() == kind::string;
Complexity

Constant.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
